label: A4BC2_mC28_15_2f_e_f-001
title: Sm$_{2}$SCl$_{4}$ Structure
comments:
(M\"{u}ller, 1993) found Gd$_{2}$SCl$_{4}$ (ICSD, 56742), but that reference is difficult to obtain so we use the later work of (Lissner, 1999) and designate Sm$_{2}$SCl$_{4}$ as the prototype. 
 The ICSD lists this as having the Mn$_{5}$C$_{2}$ structure, which is the \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B5_mC28_15_f_e2f-001}{B$_{2}$Pd$_{5}$ structure} in our system, but, in AFLOW finds the structures different enough to warrant a new prototype.
